cast.name: 娜塔莉·布罗丝 Natali Broods
鲍里斯·范塞文 Boris Van Severen

introduction: Skunk follows Liam, a neglected teen who is taken away from his parents’ home, where substances and violence reigned. Trading his school for a closed youth facility, he has trouble starting over again as he gets bullied even worse there. Although Liam finds solace with a new friend and social workers at first, when he revisits old traumas during counselling, his past keeps haunting him.“Skunk” is based on a novel written by Geert Taghon.源自：https://poff.ee/en/film/skunk/
